description: Detects a suspicious svchost process start Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Svchost Process
query: ((process.executable:*\\svchost.exe AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:(*\\services.exe OR *\\MsMpEng.exe OR *\\Mrt.exe OR *\\rpcnet.exe OR *\\svchost.exe OR *\\ngen.exe OR *\\TiWorker.exe)))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:process.parent.executable)))
